name: Multilevel Crazy Runner Crime
description:
Multilevel Crazy Runner Crime

Its about survival and smashing in car. All happening is high quality 3D.
You can also play missions where you must hunt around for various objects, lights, signs. etc. Chase down the people, cars.
The ultimate goal is to do as much damage as possible to maximize your score.
Some go ahead and give this funny Simulator Game a try.
>>In this game there are two types<<

1) Mission:- In this type you have to complete task which is given to you.
you have to fight with different charactors and destroy water tent, walls, etc..

2) Map:- Map mode is free to play you can play anywhere and destroy cars.

Each level has its own unique elements.

Top Game Features Include:-

--4 Massive Maps to explore

--Desert maps, City and Farm Settings

--Excellent sound effects

--High Quality 3D graphics and exciting gameplay.
